classes

Class DefaultGanttChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.DefaultGanttChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GanttChart

    public class DefaultGanttChart
extends java.lang.Object
implements GanttChart
    A displayable Gantt Chart. This class only serves as a way to display a Gantt Chart. In no way will it check if the entries actually makes sense at all. You can subclass this to display it in GUI. This class is actually unused and just serve as a model class.
